page.title: 17BENTWORTH HOME SURVEY cont.
page.content:
HOME LIFE LOCAL HISTORY
Most houses in Bentworth are detached.There are quite a lot of semi-detached houses.There aren't very many bungalows and only 2 flats. Oil heating is most popular in Bentworth.A lot of people like open fires and solid fuel is also popular. Only 10 people have electric and only 4 gas. Tiled roofs are most popular in Bentworth.Slate is second most popular and three people have thatched roofs. One person has a flat roof and one corrugated iron. by Andrew & Jonathan.
